price: 14. Mpe bato ya Aykah, na bato ya Tubba, banso baboyaki kondima na batindami kasi bakozuaka etumbu.
arabic: وَأَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡأَيۡكَةِ وَقَوۡمُ تُبَّعٖۚ كُلّٞ كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ وَعِيدِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-aṣḥābu al-aykati waqawmu tubbaʿin kullun kadhaba al-rusula faḥaqqa waʿīdi
